title: When someone asks how Caitlyn and Sona can fight in skirts. . . .

replies.body: Sona's skirt is really really long though, so whatevs.
Many scientists now believe that a skirt of that length is known as a dress
http://i743.photobucket.com/albums/xx80/TheChaos0/mind-blown-2.gif
Please, {{champion:80}}  can fight in nothing but his speedos
Yes but we aren't talking about the manliest man of men.

{{champion:201}} What?
{{champion:201}} But he doesn't even have a mustache...
{{champion:86}} Or shouder pads twice the size of Teemo

{{champion:82}} Or giant pizza feet.

And you know what they say about guys with big feet.

There is a reason Mordekaiser es numero uno.
{{champion:37}} !!!
{{champion:44}}  Outrageous.
Because he isn't compensating for having wimpy shoulders, that's why.

Well,

we cannot see his face.

you cannot disprove the stache.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
According to Schrodinger's mustache, there is neither a mustache or not a mustache
ahh but according to Heisenberg's principle of uncertainty, they might be a VIRTUAL moustache, as long as it is there for a sufficiently short amount of time, per appearance.
upvoted because physics

Did you call?

http://img.memecdn.com/dat-sparkle_o_153058.jpg

Bitch please.

https://i.warosu.org/data/cgl/img/0069/82/1374381989525.jpg
Its a lot easier to fight in a skirt than in skinny jeans, i would imagine.
Ladies skinny jeans are made of very stretchy material and provide much more free movement than men's (unless you wearin JNCO,  then nothing can stop you obviously)

Okay so now I can stop feeling bad for my girlfriend when she's wearing skinny jeans?

Also upvote this post if you're sick of jeans being labeled skinny or slim and they are still pretty loose.

PEOPLE WITH SCRAWNY LEGS (heck the rest of me is scrawny too, like stereotypical lead singer of a hipster band scrawny) UNITE!
No, you should still feel bad for her because her pockets are useless.
Seriously, can we get women's clothing that has *functional pockets?* It's so dumb trying to carry anything of use in those.
I'm a dude who wears cargo pants all the time, and I still wish I had more pocket space. I can't imagine what it would be like to live with no functional pocket space!
Why do you think most women carry purses? I'll give you a hint, it's not because purses are great fashion accessories, it's because ZERO POCKET SPACE.
Women can carry purses. The only way to keep things fair was to make sure their pockets are useless, so that they cannot carry *that* much more than men.

I freak people out when I pull full-fledged books out of my pockets- and then my 3DS- and then headphones and pencils and a notebook.
I love pockets.
Dude I wear womens skinny jeans, and they fit me way better than most mens jeans xD fun fact: women think so too, and start checking out your ass...

Well, I imagine you probably get some odd looks from the employees when you're getting them xD

But yeah they should really make a skinnier form of skinny jeans so women can appreciate men's booties as much as we appreciate theirs.
Fun fact, 68% of woman agree that the butt is a man's best asset.
"ASSet" I see what you did there. :3

Can confirm, guy skinny jeans are restrictive as heck, at least until you break them in for several months.

Not to mention you have to be actually skinny for them to fit in the first place.

Skinny jeans for women are basically yoga pants half the time. Lulu lemon makes a denim set of lulu pants which are the only "jeans" my fiance wears (meanwhile 90% of me wearing pants involves wranglers bc cheap jeans are comfy)
Riven fights with a skirt, sorta

It's a towel. GET YOUR FACTS STRAIGHT.

(Seriously though, wtf is she wearing)
Rags.

Ah, so she's a pleb.

Makes sense. Her player base is now defined.
It is then you realize "exile" is pretty much just a fancy word for hobo now that there's no League for her to exist at.
fun fact base on the differences on both men and women (yes gender related) a skirt make more sense for men and pants for women
You mean a kilt?

No, that's Scottish.

A kilt, IIRC, is a type of skirt kind of like how a thumb is to a finger.

Yes, man can wear skirts. It's ~~Western~~ American culture for the most part that has little concept of men skirts, while other parts of the world do.

Generally there's a name for the different skirts, but at the end of the day they're basically skirts. And that's okay. Remember, pink isn't a girly color, it's just the blood of your enemies not washing out of your white shirt properly.
But Scottish people are awesome. Why wouldn't we want to emulate them?

Skirts came before kilts, that's basically what I'm implying here :3

And yes, Scottish people are amazing. But I don't think their kilts are battle regalia, unless I'm mistaken?
Scottish wore kilts into battle, if that's what you're asking.
Ah, okay that makes sense. I *was* mistaken then!
Some wore kilts into battle, but, according to Wikipedia, some people took off their kilts before battle. And, you know, there was nothing underneath.
Pfft, implying Rome didn't build one of the greatest empires in history while wearing manly combat skirts
hype for rwby volume 3!
I love rwby <3
but Sona doesn't fight :/ she just plays music, and it happens to kill/heal people and make them dance

How did Scotsmen fight in them?

With lots of yelling and probably copious amounts of alcohol.
